UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of the antimicrobial peptide corresponding to C-terminal beta-sheet domain of tenecin 1, an antibacterial protein of larvae of Tenebrio molitor.
Literature.Author: Lee KH, Hong SY, Oh JE, Kwon M, Yoon JH, Lee J, Lee BL, Moon HM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>100µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=>100µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=>100µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis ATCC 607(MIC=>100µg/ml),Corynebacterium diphtheriae ATCC 8024(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 2592(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>100µg/ml),Shigella flexneri ATCC 203(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 36232(MIC=>100µg/ml)
